document.full_text: over more than 50 years, rich clarkson has been a pivotal figure in photojournalism as an editor. but he has also made his mark with his own camera - on the basketball court.
document.title: more than 50 years of the final four
lines_and_colors: over more than 50 years, rich clarkson has been a pivotal figure in photojournalism as an editor. but he has also made his mark with his own camera - on the basketball court.
